articles.title: Arteta says Arsenal's overhaul must be 'ruthless' as Gunners face season out of Europe - Goal.com
articles.description: The Chelsea Supporters' Trust has requested that UEFA move the upcoming Champions League final after Turkey was added to England's travel red list on Friday.

articles.title: Mikel Arteta demands 'ruthless' Arsenal clear-out of underperforming squad - The Telegraph
articles.description: Arsenal face the prospect of no European football next season for the first time in 25 years

articles.title: Sailing duo Paul Snow-Hansen and Dan Willcox primed for Olympics after winning European title - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Paul Snow-Hansen and Dan Willcox couldn't have asked for a better result heading into the Tokyo Games.
articles.content:
Paul Snow-Hansen and Dan Willcox couldn't have asked for a better result heading into the Tokyo Olympics after winning the open men's 470 title at the European championships in Portugal.
